conclusion: Identify the system and forces: four identical blocks, B and C connected by a spring, force F applied to B, smooth surface.
Determine the acceleration: entire system accelerates together, total mass is 4m, acceleration a = F/4m.
Block D is part of the system and will also accelerate with a.
Analyze the forces on block D: no friction with surface, static friction force from block C.
Determine the static friction force: f_s = ma, substituting a gives f_s = F/4.
Conclusion: magnitude of static friction force on block D is F/4.
